name: Fruit Idler
description:
I have been working on this new idle game recently and i just want some feedback from the community.  You can buy workers that work for fruits, you can buy salesman that will sell the fruit in which you gain. Also you can upgrade the price of the fruits. Later it is planned to add many new things if the community takes the game well.

If you are enjoying the game and would like to see it progress farther feel free to donate to help motivate me to continue.

Update 0.1.0

-Added XP and Leveling UP

-Added Skill Points

-Added Skills that can be upgraded

-Fixed a Save and Load bug not working

-A new save is required as some things have been changed in the save/load process

-Should now work on Linux, Mac Os X, and Windows with there respective Downloads

-Skills will pertain through prestige when it is added next.

As always Have fun and enjoy

Join discord at https://discord.gg/ctYFvY to get into the feedback process.
